content: We are encouraged by the early results from the investment in new buyer channels that I mentioned last quarter, and we expect continued improvement into the second half driving buyer mix toward our 60% owner sales target and embedding additional value into the enterprise through new buyer growth. In our resort and club business, our consolidated member count was 508,000 looking at HGVs legacy business, NOG was 3.2% at the end of the quarter, Diamond also added 1400 net new members during the quarter.
